events.message: I filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle last night on Main Street.
The claim was categorized under auto accident after reviewing the initial report and damage details.
An agent has been assigned to manage the case and contact me regarding the next steps.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of my claim and confirmed that processing has started.
They requested vehicle registration, police report, and photos of the collision damage for further investigation.
I submitted all requested documents including the police report and multiple images of the damaged vehicle.
The investigation team has started reviewing all submitted materials and assessing the damage circumstances.
Investigation completed with findings confirming the collision details aligned with the claimantâ€™s report.
The insurer proposed a settlement amount to cover the repair costs of my car and related expenses.
I provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the timely communication and reasonable settlement offer.
My claim was formally approved based on review of the investigation results and accepted settlement proposal.
The payment covering the approved amount was issued and transferred to my bank account promptly.
Following payment receipt, the claim was officially closed with no further pending actions required.
All documents and communication records related to the claim were archived for future reference.
